message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the use of machine learning to detect Flash malware and the limitations of such systems against adversarial examples. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of static analysis and feature extraction, which are common techniques in the fields of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the limitations of defense techniques, which falls under the category of Software Engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper suggests alternative research directions to improve the security of learning-based Flash malware detectors, which is related to the category of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
